metadata.name: RAYS OF HOPE #1
metadata.description:
Everyday is a new hope to me. Here I met the same guy like me. He also have the same hope for getting  fish.....

I clicked this photograph from the coastal belt of Kerala's Thrissur district, locally known as Arappa near Snehatheeram beach. A transition zone between the river and sea, this forms an estuary during monsoon in Gods own country. The beam light in the frame  gives a uniqueness to the photograph....

I have captured this image with limited gears, a base model camera (NIKON D3500) and 50MM lens.
